thread.title: Shelburne residents buy their mobile home park
thread.title_full: Shelburne residents buy their mobile home park - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Shelburne residents buy their mobile home park
text:
SHELBURNE, Vt. - Itâ€™s official; residents of a mobile home park in Shelburne now own the property.
Residents of Shelburnewood faced the prospect of having to move to make room for various developments. But Philanthropist and developer Tony Pomerleau stepped in a couple of years ago and bought the property.
Wednesday the residents officially formed a co-op and bought the property from him.
